section.5: Establishing the Prayer and the Sunnah Regarding Them

hadiths.text: It was narrated from Kathir bin Murrah that Abu Fatimah told him:“I said: ‘O Messenger of Allah! Tell me of a deed that I can adhere to and act upon.’ He said: “You should prostrate, for you will not prostrate to Allah but He will raise you in status one degree thereby and erase from you one sin.”
